availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, enslaved man. Enslaved by Jesse Williams in Princeton, Kentucky. Commanded by Jesse Williams to shoot Edmund Stevens on May 25, 1859. Escaped the Caldwell County Jail on April 13, 1861. Sentenced to death for the murder of Edmund Stevens in Caldwell County on June 15, 1861. Sentenced to be hanged on September 6, 1861, in the Caldwelll Circuit Court on June 15, 1861. Death sentence commuted to life in prison on August 26, 1861. Died in the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Frankfort on January 10, 1863.
